snippet: In a new test for the company's stock, over 1.6 billion shares will be eligible to come on the market in several waves when a number of shareholders are allowed to sell. Read more »
abstract: In a new test for the company's stock, over 1.6 billion shares will be eligible to come on the market in several waves when a number of shareholders are allowed to sell. Read more »

headline.main: A Steep Climb Back for Facebook's Stock
